vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway1.redeem (patch_1.sol#9-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_1.sol#12)

external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway1.Command (patch_1.sol#21-25):
